Apache Chainsaw™

Release History

Version Date Description
1.99.99 UNKNOWN

Release 1.99.99 - UNKNOWN

Type Changes By
Added support for remembering filter expressions for each LogPanel Fixes 42789. Thanks to Isuru Suriarachchi. psmith
Added 'Go To Line' feature to navigate to a particular event # Fixes 42851. Thanks to Isuru Suriarachchi. psmith
Added ability to hide Welcome and Drag and Drop panels. Fixes 42883. Thanks to Isuru Suriarachchi. psmith
Added ability to remember last created receivers in an xml file, and load them at startup. Fixes 43158. Thanks to Isuru Suriarachchi. psmith
Added ability to remember hidden log panels. Fixes 42883. Thanks to Isuru Suriarachchi. psmith
Address memory leak when using cyclic model Fixes 42670. psmith
javadoc.jar was missing NOTICE and LICENSE. Fixes 49078.
